labels.LABEL_13: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems?

concepts.PCA,_GRADE_OF_ASCITES_23_DESC: Grade 1: Mild, Grade 2: Moderate, Grade 3: Abundant
concepts.PCA,_PATIENT_EDUCATION_AND_INFORMATION_F: Patient education and information for next session
concepts.PCA,_NORTON_SCORE_36_DESC: <10 very high risk; 10-14 high risk; 15-18 medium risk; >18 low risk
concepts.PCA,_COMMENT_RELATED_TO_PATIENT_DISEASE_: Comment related to patient disease understanding
concepts.PCA,_BEDSIDE_ORAL_EXAM_(BOE)_SCORE_56_DE: <8 is considered normal, Between 9-16 is considered moderate, 17-24 is considered severe
concepts.PCA,_PATIENT_UNDERSTANDS_THEIR_DISEASE_A: Patient understands their disease and prognosis
concepts.PCA,_FEELING_NERVOUS,_ANXIOUS_OR_ON_EDGE: Feeling nervous, anxious or on edge
concepts.PCA,_NOT_BEING_ABLE_TO_STOP_OR_CONTROL_W: Not being able to stop or control worrying
concepts.PCA,_COMMENT_RELATED_TO_GUARDIAN_DISEASE: Comment related to guardian disease understanding
concepts.PCA,_COMMENT_RELATED_TO_PHYSICAL_EXAMINA: If patient is facing social, spiritual or sexual issues, specify here
concepts.PCA,_LITTLE_INTEREST_OR_PLEASURE_IN_DOIN: Little interest or pleasure in doing things
concepts.PCA,_WHO_PERFORMANCE_STATUS_(ECOG)_11_DE:
0: Fully active, able to carry on all pre-disease performance without restriction                                                 1: Restricted in physically strenuous activity but ambulatory and able to carry out work of a light or sedentary nature,                                                                            2: Ambulatory and capable of all self-care but unable to carry out any work activities. Up and about more than 50% of waking hours
3: Capable of only limited self-care, confined to bed or chair more than 50% of waking hours                                                     4: Completely disabled. Cannot carry out any selfcare; totally confined to bed or chair                                                 5. Dead
concepts.PCA,_GUARDIAN_UNDERSTANDS_DISEASE_AND_PR: Guardian understands disease and prognosis of the patient
